tutorial.1: On this map, the pins represent hydrometric stations monitoring river flow  all around the world.
tutorial.2: A click on a hydrometric station will load the associated data that you can explore visually and musically.
tutorial.3: Here is the bar charts panel where you can see the seasonality of average, high and low flows as well as the overall average flow.
tutorial.4: You can click here to show/hide the bar charts panel.
tutorial.5: Here, you can play/pause and stop the music once a station is selected. As the music plays, the bar charts will animate to highlight which month you're currently listening to.
tutorial.6: There are different options you can play with to modify the melody. A click here shows/hides the panel with all the options.
tutorial.7: All done! You're good to go!
